alert.title: Airport Alert
alert.text: Additional international check-in counters are available at curbside 3 from 5am-9am.

body.title: TERMINAL AND GATE
body.heading: Terminal A,B&C
body.text:
Gates A:1-11 B:2-15 C:10,12,14

  • Fly By Checkin
  • Fly By Security
  • Express Bag Drop

body.title: TICKET COUNTER HOURS
body.text:
Sunday - Friday

Opens 180 minutes before first departure

Saturday

Opens 180 minutes before first departure

  • All bags must be checked 45 minutes prior to scheduled departure

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area:  One Pet Relief Area is located at the end of Concourse E on the lower level outside door #19, near the International Terminal and adjacent to the light rail station. The second Pet Relief Area is located in front of the Hourly Garage. To access this location, use the B skywalk to the Hourly Garage, take the Tower B elevator down to Level 3, follow the white lined path to the right and look for a concrete wall opening and red awning overhead on the right-hand side.

Learn more about Baltimore/Washington International Airport
